descripcion:
	Es responsable de diagnosticar, reparar, hacer actualizaciones y probar el producto que requiere servicio de mantenimiento ya sea preventivo y/o correctivo.

	Es responsable de completar reparaciones y actualizaciones involucrando el des-armado y armado de ensambles electro-mecánicos utilizando herramientas y equipos de precisión.

	Es capaz de encontrar la causa raíz de las fallas reportadas por los clientes en los equipos retornados para servicio. 

	Es responsable de llevar el control de las partes que fueron remplazadas durante el proceso de servicio de cada unidad.

	Debe ser capaz de completar las pruebas funcionales siguiendo al detalle los procedimientos de prueba. Las pruebas pueden incluir pruebas eléctricas usando instrumentos de prueba eléctrica, fixturas customizadas, equipo de laboratorio y/o básculas. 

	Este trabajo debe realizarlo siguiendo los procedimientos establecidos y en cumplimiento de las Buenas Prácticas de Manufactura (GMP´s), QSR Y FDA con un alto grado de responsabilidad hacia la calidad del producto.

	Participa en el proceso de producción en forma inmediata y reportando inmediatamente al supervisor o jefe de línea responsable del área cualquier falla que detecte durante el proceso de pruebas.

	Llenará reportes y registros de pruebas realizadas al producto según se requieran así como capturará información en las órdenes de servicio (preferentemente en ingles).
requisitos:
• Como Técnico de Diagnóstico de Equipos, de preferencia en equipos con fallas de campo (RMA's).

• Experiencia en procesos de reparación de tarjetas con tecnologías PTH, SMT. Soldadura RoHS y no RoHS.

• Uso de equipo de reparación de tarjetas (cautín, extractor, boquillas), conocimiento en ESD y controles ESD.

• Uso de equipo de medición como osciloscopio, multímetro, y uso de algún software para diagnóstico de equipo.

• Uso de diagramas electrónicos para búsqueda de fallas en tarjetas y/o equipos.



NOTA: SE REQUIERE MANEJO DE INGLES TECNICO

puesto: Software Quality Assurance Sr. Engineer (Tester Sr)
descripcion:
This is a hands-on Software Quality Assurance position that will be responsible for the testing and the end quality of a variety of applications. The candidate for this position will work in an Agile or Waterfall environment with development, Project Management and multiple Business partners and will be responsible for design, development and execution of test plans and test cases. The job will also include, Collaborating with the Agile or Waterfall development team, test planning, manual and automation testing, defect logging/verification, and review of requirements and use-cases. The role will lead the effort to build new test frameworks and or extend existing frameworks. The role promotes QA productivity through automation, tools, and other best practices.



Essential Functions:

•Design and execute automated and manual test cases

•Ensure products meet or exceed the specified standards, acceptance criteria and end-user requirements.

•Actively participate and contribute to defining test scope, coverage, and overall strategy for projects.

•Participate in Backlog grooming and proving LOE

•Perform Positive/Negative/Integration/Regression/Automation tests

•Provide feedback on usability, report defects relating to the application, verify defect fixes provided by developers, and take appropriate action based on the validity of the development solutions.
requisitos:
•Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

•A minimum of at least 5 years of experience as a manual tester.

•Working Test knowledge into automation frameworks, exposure to various industry tools of automation across web, desktop and services.

•At least 3 years of experience as an automation tester with Selenium and UFT (QTP).

•Test management tools (ALM) as well as Jira (Atlassian suite).

•Experience as an individual contributor and leading teams of 2+ resources

•Experience working in distributed environment

•Experience in KPI reporting, communication with Business/Stakeholders

•Experience with ERP systems



Additional Skills:

•Attention to detail are essential, as is the ability to quickly learn new applications and technologies in a fast-paced environment. 

•Exposure to complex integrated systems

This includes coordinating the efforts of team members and third-party contractors or consultants in order to deliver projects according to plan. The scrum master is a very skilled project manager who leads several scrum teams focused on Cloud management and implementation, software development, bioinformatics and other high tech areas.

descripcion:
Job Description

Thermo Fisher Scientific's mission is to help make the world a healthier, cleaner and safer place. This position offers a unique opportunity at Thermo Fisher Scientific to help our mission by leading and executing on next generation architecture and platform.

We are looking for an ambitious, talented, and self-motivated individual, who will serve as a lead software engineer and help us implement the next generation enterprise architecture and platform. In this role, you will be responsible for providing input for the next generation architecture, platform strategy and implementing platform capabilities that supports the organization's business strategy. 

The role requires working collaboratively across the Technology, Product and Commercial organizations to ensure alignment towards business goals. In this role, you will build strong relationships with cross-functional team members and business stakeholders.

 

 Responsibilities

 Proven experience with distributed systems

Proven experience with software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile/iterative methodologies required

Understand and follow conventions and best practices for analysis, statistics, modeling, coding, and architecture; hold other members of the team accountable for doing so

Develop and adhere to rigorous testing of statistics, models, and code

Develop training materials and educate others on best practices

Design and document APIs leveraging a standard API documentation framework (Swagger)

Stay up to date with new technologies and determine how to incorporate these into future platform capabilities

Build strong relationships with cross-functional team members and business stakeholders

Share business and technical learnings with the broader engineering and product organization, while adapting approach for different audiences

Work collaboratively across the Technology, UX, and Product organizations to ensure alignment towards business goals

descripcion:
Objetivo del puesto: Ejecutar el correcto procesamiento de la información a través de sistema ULTIPRO para el pago oportuno a los empleados que se encuentran en la operación de Estados Unidos.



1. Responsable de llevar a cabo procesos de la base de datos de UltiPro como;

a. Altas de empleados

b. Registros de entrada y salida

c. Vacaciones

d. Permisos

e. Días de enfermedad

f. Captura de amonestaciones

2. Elaboración de reportes de incidencias de UltiPro solicitados por supervisor y gerentes de distrito.

3. Responsable de brindar soporte y aclaración de dudas relacionadas con UltiPro.

4. Homologar información de UltiPro para que coincida con base de datos de TRESS cuando es solicitado por supervisor.

5. Responsable de llevar a cabo proceso de TRESSenlace como;

a. Altas de usuarios

b. Envió de usuarios a supervisores

c. Desbloquear y restablecer contraseñas

6. Cambio y desbloqueo de contraseñas de agencias en sus páginas web para que agentes puedan ingresar a sistema.

7. Actualizar base de datos con códigos de agencia, usuarios y contraseñas.

8. Registro de nuevos códigos y oficinas en las agencias en páginas web y bases de datos.

a. Agregar oficinas a cuenta de LastPass y hacerlas visibles en distrito correspondiente.

b. Enviar los registros de oficinas a ITC, y AppOne para que agentes puedan realizar una venta.

c. Solicitar al departamento de Information Technology correos electrónicos de las nuevas oficinas.

9. Crear usuarios especiales para imprimir reportes de bancos, comisiones, códigos y ventas.

10. Reorganización de oficinas de ventas en los distintos distritos.

11. Registro de brokers en las agencias.

12. Cambio de URL de páginas web de las agencias para el mejor funcionamiento de las mismas.

13. Mantenimiento de registros en base de datos en caso de fallas en el sistema.

14. Mantenimiento a cuentas de LastPass para mejor rendimiento del sistema.

15. Dar soporte a personal con fallas en sistema LastPass.
requisitos:

Manejo del idioma inglés, avanzado (85% escrito y hablado)



Paquetería office, Navegadores



Experiencia de 1 a 3 meses (deseable)



Manejo de Ultipro, TRESSenlace

descripcion:
Objetivo del Puesto:

Desarrollar e implementar proyectos de formación y planificar estrategias de enseñanza que se adapten a las necesidades de capacitación de la empresa.



Responsabilidades y Funciones del Puesto:

1. Facilitar programas de capacitación para nuevos ingresos y apoyar en las iniciativas de capacitación para el personal operativo.

2. Mostrar versatilidad ante los nuevos estilos de aprendizaje de las nuevas contrataciones.

3. Realizar labores administrativas en la gestión del entrenamiento y documentar inasistencias, observaciones el progreso del empleado e implementar amonestaciones.

4. Implementar evaluaciones de aprendizaje y desempeño de los empleados en capacitación.

5. Proporcionar retroalimentación a los empleados y apoyarlos en su desarrollo operativo.

6. Supervisar a los empleados durante las fases de entrenamiento durante todo el proceso del curso.

7. Informar las estadísticas necesarias de nuevos empleados, determinadas por el área donde se solicita la capacitación.

8. Participar en proyectos especiales y realizar tareas administrativas según lo asignado.

9. Crear y ofrecer un ambiente de entrenamiento positivo, divertido y gratificante en el aula.

puesto: Sales / Customer Service - Ventas / Atención Al Cliente
descripcion:
Sales Enablement Role



One of the world's largest manufactures of reciprocating hermetic compressors, and motors products, and is seeking a motivated, service-oriented professional to enhance its inside sales functions and take its Customer Service to the next level.



Responsibilities:



- Managing the adoption and usage of our sales enablement portal.

- Manage/Administrate Hubspot for the aftermarket which is our CRM program.

- Identify gaps in our current collateral and tools and partnering with the VP of Marketing to close those gaps.

- Provide excellent customer service and treat this responsibility as your number one priority.

* Work as a team with the Territory Account Manager, provide constant communication, sales numbers, orders, questions, daily outside sales schedule, provide a daily update.

- Provide maximum customer assistance in placing orders, providing product information, proper coding of returns, ensuring appropriate credit approvals, and proper pricing.

- Provide generated sales orders which includes confirming price and availability at time of order, credits, warranty claims, etc, in accordance with company guidelines to clients.

- Carry out inside sales plans as set out by the division sales manager. This includes telemarketing drives, outcall programs, email or fax drives, discussions with product, account and sales managers on sales strategy and results of these efforts, periodic strategy meetings on accounts with branch, accounts and sales managers.

- Work with the Director of Business Development on special pricing for significant product purchases, etc.

- Direct special quotes to the proper territory;

- Direct customers to website, if possible, in trying to assist them in finding the part or product which is required.

- Become a business consultant to our distributors.
requisitos:
- Strong sales literacy and fluency.

- 3-5+ years in sales or sales enablement a plus.

- Bachelor's Degree is a plus.

- Experience in problem solving and multi-tasking.

- CRM Program usage experience a plus.

- MS Office Suite: PowerPoint, Excel, Word.

- Excellent English verbal and written communication skills.

- Motivated self-starter with high energy.

- Project management skills – the ability to meet deadlines.

- Great sense of humor.

- Bilingual (English & Spanish).

Summary:

Identify hazardous workplace conditions, measure and control chemical and physical hazards, and provide recommendations on how to remove hazards and/or protect employees. Prepare and calibrate testing equipment. Create, update, and review H&S related policies and procedures, conduct and develop safe work practice training courses, and provide assistance and/or recommendations for new equipment design or process changes. Takes effective steps to ensure that workplace conditions comply with applicable federal, state and country occupational safety and health standards. Participates in regulatory, internal and third party inspections and any procedures or corrective actions that may follow an audit. Investigate reports of near misses, injuries and fatalities. Identify and develop strategies, programs, or initiatives that positively affect employee health and safety and reduce environmental impact. Assists in the implementation of ISO 14001 and other applicable systems.

Principal Responsibilities:

• Improve compliance by implementing or supporting health and safety programs

• Conduct and manage industrial hygiene and environmental sampling and/or assessment activities

• Conduct or manage safety and job hazard analysis or audit activities

• Support the Safety committees and brigades

• Provide technical support on health and safety matters to leaders and employees

• Recommend measures to help protect workers from potentially hazardous work methods, processes, or materials

• Maintains records, including but not limited to:Employee chemical and physical hazard exposure records; Equipment field calibration records; Employee health and safety training records conducted by the HSE Department

• Provide and develop applicable health and safety training to employees

• Identify opportunities to reduce toxic material use that negatively impacts employee health, safety and the environment and reduces or eliminates regulatory oversight. Develop proposals, action plans, or programs to achieve this goal

descripcion:
The Quality Engineer (Aircraft Systems & Components) ensures ramp readiness of ICON and its suppliers of mechanical and electrical parts and assemblies. 



Mission of Role: Ensure ramp readiness of ICON and its suppliers of mechanical and electrical parts and assemblies. Manage risk continuously to improve the quality/delivery/cost performance for the A5 program.

1.	Conduct assessments of potential suppliers to assist Purchasing in determining sources for production components and systems.

2.	Conduct assessments and calculate adequate production capacity at key suppliers to determine overall production risk.

3.	Use Advanced Product Quality Planning (APQP) process with suppliers to ensure flawless launches of new components and systems.

4.	Assist with the development of manufacturing and quality processes to ensure zero defects.

5.	Communicate major launch concerns to ICON leadership to ensure timely resolution.

6.	Develop, maintain, and improve supplier quality procedures such as assessments, audits, corrective actions.

7.	Review Production Part Approval Process (PPAP) packages and provide feedback to suppliers.

8.	Provide support to Manufacturing Engineering, Quality, and Product Engineering in the analysis and disposition of Non Conformances.

9.	Identify production deficiencies, identify Root Cause and Corrective Action, and own the correction implementation; throughout the manufacturing of the part, to successful implementation onto the ICON production line. 

10.	Assist in addressing quality issues, track and trend improvement schedules, and recommend improvements to manufacturing processes.

11.	Provide training and support to suppliers' inspectors.

12.	Drive continuous improvement (quality /delivery / cost) throughout the supply base using lean manufacturing and proven quality management methods.

13.	Participate in supplier performance reviews.

14.	Conduct quality audits to ensure compliance to ICON Technical and Quality Specifications (Internal or External).

15.	Develop and implement supplier improvement plans for under-performing suppliers.
requisitos:
•	Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or related technical field; MS preferred

•	3-8 years of experience in implementing and improving quality and quality systems in the aviation, automotive, or medical device industries.



Success Indicators:



1.	Quality procedures are complete and effective.

2.	Suppliers fully understand timing, quality and documentation requirements and are able comply.

3.	Supplier production tooling and equipment is complete, in place, and verified in time to meet start of production.

4.	Statistical Process Control for processes shows stability and can readily identify potential deviations.

5.	Systems are implemented which error proof the production process.

6.	Zero quality escapes from suppliers at production launch.

7.	Continuous high ratings on Supplier Scorecard.

Deloitte es una de las organizaciones líderes en servicios profesionales en el mundo, gracias al esfuerzo continuo y talento de nuestra gente. Juntos sumamos aproximadamente 200,000 profesionales en más de 150 países. 



Y hoy, tú puedes ser parte de este gran equipo, en México.

Ya sea que estés dedicado a ofrecer servicios a clientes selectos en auditoría, consultoría, impuestos y servicios legales, asesoría financiera, administración integral de riesgos o servicios de outsourcing, o bien, participes en las áreas de soporte, en Deloitte podrás:



•	Trabajar en equipo con los mejores profesionales, aprendiendo de tus compañeros y alcanzando juntos el éxito.

•	Conocer y/o trabajar directamente con las organizaciones más importantes del país, ayudándolas a alcanzar sus objetivos de negocio.

•	Contar con grandes oportunidades de aprendizaje y desarrollo, en donde tú mismo decides hacia dónde quieres llevar tu carrera.



En Deloitte todos tenemos la visión de ser el estándar de excelencia. ¿Estás listo para unirte a nuestro equipo y aceptar el reto?

For more than 50 years, we've been driven by a single obsession to support our customers' most important needs: experiencing and facilitating simple and clear communications while enjoying distraction-free environments.



Mission: We discover and invent the tools and technologies that provide a focused and distraction-free environment for you to perform at your best.



Summary



We are seeking a proactive strategic Human Resources Professional who will be responsible for supporting assigned departments in a variety of ways, including talent management, organizational development, and employee relations.



Responsibilities:

• Develop strong relationships with supported business functions and assist in determining Human Resources priorities consistent with business objectives.

• Partner with management to build and develop stronger work teams.

• Drive year-round talent management processes, including talent reviews workforce calibration, development plans, and succession planning.

• Effectively drive leadership development, management/employee coaching, and performance management.

• Analyze key HR metrics, identify areas of opportunity, and assist in develop related action plans

• Provide training for employees and managers on HR topics as needed.

• Coach employees and managers on organizational practices, processes, and values.

• Resolve employee relations issues, performing investigations as needed.

• Guide managers and employees through discipline and performance improvement procedures.

• Collaborate with other members of HR to leverage expertise, systems, and processes in support of business needs.

• Work on HR related projects.

descripcion:
Role

The Quality Assurance Specialist at Confie is responsible for objectively monitoring, scoring, and coaching agents in compliance of internal quality standards and expectations. This position is responsible for accurately recording data, analyzing data, and identifying trends, training gaps, call drivers, and effectively communicating those findings to the appropriate departments. The Quality Assurance Specialist will build strong partnerships with the Training and Operations teams to create and implement quality initiatives by thinking outside of the box to improve overall quality at an agent and program level. 

The successful candidate will have a background in a contact center environment, preferable with Quality Assurance knowledge, previous experience coaching and developing agents, proven ability to prioritize critical needs, possess strong attention to detail, and be results driven.     



Responsibilities

•	Call/Process auditing

•	Feedback delivery

•	Reporting and Analysis

•	Procedure and Product Knowledge
requisitos:
Job Qualifications

Here is what you will absolutely need in order to be successful in this role:

• At least have six (6) months contact/call center experience.

• 1 year of experience performing Quality Assurance duties (Monitor and evaluate calls; provide feedback; reporting and trend analysis, among others) is desirable

• Experience developing and implementing QA programs (Implement actions to eliminate errors, process improvements, improve guidelines, among others) is desirable

• Strong knowledge of customer care processes and techniques is required

• Insurance industry knowledge is desirable

• Strong organizational, leadership, and interpersonal management skills

• Demonstrated communication skills, both written and verbal. 

• Demonstrate ability to communicate information and ideas clearly, and concisely, in writing and verbally.

• Proficient in Microsoft Windows applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)

• Ability to maintain confidentiality

• Demonstrate ability to make a decision by using logic to identify key facts, explore alternatives and propose quality solutions

• Exceptional listening and analytical skills. 

• Must exhibit excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.

• Analytic; willing to help, quick learner, Time availability

• Fully Bilingual (Spanish/English)

• High school diploma or GED  is required

• Must be able to read and write English.

puesto: Quality Systems Specialist (AT Santee CA USA)
descripcion:
•	To work at Santee Ca,

If you have a passion for science and are motivated to do your best work  by contributing to quality products and patient outcomes, then  Scantibodies Laboratory, Inc. might be the place for you! We are looking  for a top Quality Systems Specialist to join our innovative team. 

•	Summary:  

The objectives of the position are to create and maintain systems and  processes, which meet regulations and quality system standards while  meeting or exceeding customer expectations for products and services  offered by SLI.  This involves the application of quality tools and  techniques to create robust manufacturing and testing processes and  specifications while seeking to improve organizational effectiveness.   The person in the position is a driver of improvement throughout the  organization, utilizing data accumulated through the various processes  in the organization.  

•	Essential Duties:         

Procedural review and approval and quality system development

Support continuous product and process improvement through detailed  failure analysis for non-conformances and investigates, develops, and  implements effective and compliant solutions

Maintain corrective & preventive action and complaint system

Review regulatory requirements and implement policies within the quality management system to comply with requirements

Internal and external auditing and acting as quality representative for customer and regulatory/ISO audits

Mentor calibration and environmental control program staff and activities

Maintain Material Review Board program

Analysis of data and creation/revision of processes

Training of personnel in quality tools and quality systems
requisitos:
1. Must have a minimum of 4 years experience in quality tools and  techniques in a similar industry.  This includes experience in quality  management and/or regulatory affairs, CAPA and complaints, and internal  and external audits.

 

2. Must have detailed knowledge of GMP/QSR and ISO international regulations and standards which apply to SLI.

 

3. Must be computer literate in office applications such as MS Word and Excel.

 

4. Must possess excellent communication, interpersonal, and analytical  skills, both written and oral and be able to conduct presentations for  all levels of employees and management.  Interpersonal and analytical  skills should extend into areas of personnel development, coaching, and  counseling.  Interpersonal skills shall allow for building consensus and  influence others outside of areas of direct control.

 

5. Experience and/or certification in quality engineering or quality auditing skills is desired.

descripcion:
Plantronics is a global leader in business and consumer audio communications. For more than 50 years, we've been driven by a single obsession to support our customers' most important needs: experiencing and facilitating simple and clear communications while enjoying distraction-free environments. 



Mission: We discover and invent the tools and technologies that provide a focused and distraction-free environment for you to perform at your best.



Summary:

This position will play a key role in contributing to the development of Plantronics test strategies, test equipment improvement and implementation for Plantronics WW manufacturing support. 



Responsibilities:

•  (60%) include software design, analysis, programming, debugging, trouble-shooting for development of new test hardware platforms. 

• (40%) Designs, develops, modify and evaluate electronics parts, components or integrated circuitry for development of RF and audio electronic test equipment and other test hardware systems. 

• Has a very strong understanding of DECT/Bluetooth/802.11/GSM technologies. 

• Manages own programming and hardware activities including analog and digital hardware and software operating systems. 

• Responsibility for the programming in Labview. 

• Must be considered a Labview expert. Needs to have a good understanding of Test Stand. 

• Needs to have a good understanding of RF designs pertaining to DECT protocols and RF parametrics. 

• Follows standard practices and procedures to analyze situations or data from which answers can be readily obtained. Associate will receive assignments in the form of objectives with goals and will need to determine the process by which to meet those goals. 

• Works on issues where analysis of the situation or data requires review of relevant factors.
requisitos:

• Has experience developing and implementing test programs supporting high volume low test time environments.

• Experience working programming projects with multiple programs or shared development tasks.

• Experience with Object Oriented language concepts and implementation desired.

• Experience with Perforce or other SCC applications.

descripcion:
PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES 

Business Prospecting:

- Develops qualified prospects through cold calling, telemarketing, networking and other opportunities.

- Develop lists of prospects from directories, trade and professional association publications internet and other public information.

- Establish knowledge of company products/services, markets, and customers. 

- Schedules appointments, prepare and present technical marketing presentations to potential customers.

- Maintain individual contact records and logs regarding leads.

Lead Lifecycle Management:

- Determine the appropriate next steps for each contact (escalation, further cultivation, tracking, and managing to closure).

- Analyze and understand customer strategies, future product plans, and expansion activities to develop penetration strategies for new business opportunities.

- Participate in program transitions to ensure customer needs are understood.

- Support new program contract negotiations and transition to sales development.

- Converts a prospect to a customer. This is typically achieved through the completion and execution of a service agreement and other forms necessary to begin service.

Sales Coordination and Organization:

- Assist with developing strategic plans to generate sales leading to increased market share.

- Guides and execute successful penetration strategies of the company into the target markets and into leading companies within these markets.

- Provide liaison between sales, customers, and internal company resources for new business pursuit.

- Acquire knowledge of competition, their products, and markets.

- Create and generate business development reports.

- Effectively brief and leverage executives on strategy and tactics to enhance customer relationships and consummate deals.

-Provides monthly report detailing the status of the annual plan by market with appropriate commentary regarding successes, failures, obstacles, and imminent actions.

- Maintain positive company image.

- Perform other duties as assigned.
requisitos:

SKILLS:  

- Excellent consultative selling skills.

- Excels at finding and closing new business in a competitive marketplace.

- Excellent Cross-functional and personal communication skills. 

- Strong leadership, motivational, and presentation skills.

- Strong Planning, organizational and time management.

- Effective in working both independently and in a team setting.

- Able to interact with all levels of complex organizations.

- Must be proficient with Microsoft Office programs.

- Highly motivated self-starter.

- Competitive drive / Over-achiever

- Results oriented / Sense of urgency.

- Willingness to travel

- Strong English (90%-100% spoken and written)

puesto: Quality Systems Specialist (AT Santee CA USA)
descripcion:
•	To work at Santee Ca,

If you have a passion for science and are motivated to do your best work  by contributing to quality products and patient outcomes, then  Scantibodies Laboratory, Inc. might be the place for you! We are looking  for a top Quality Systems Specialist to join our innovative team. 

•	Summary:  

The objectives of the position are to create and maintain systems and  processes, which meet regulations and quality system standards while  meeting or exceeding customer expectations for products and services  offered by SLI.  This involves the application of quality tools and  techniques to create robust manufacturing and testing processes and  specifications while seeking to improve organizational effectiveness.   The person in the position is a driver of improvement throughout the  organization, utilizing data accumulated through the various processes  in the organization.  

•	Essential Duties:         

Procedural review and approval and quality system development

Support continuous product and process improvement through detailed  failure analysis for non-conformances and investigates, develops, and  implements effective and compliant solutions

Maintain corrective & preventive action and complaint system

Review regulatory requirements and implement policies within the quality management system to comply with requirements

Internal and external auditing and acting as quality representative for customer and regulatory/ISO audits

Mentor calibration and environmental control program staff and activities

Maintain Material Review Board program

Analysis of data and creation/revision of processes

Training of personnel in quality tools and quality systems
requisitos:
1. Must have a minimum of 4 years experience in quality tools and  techniques in a similar industry.  This includes experience in quality  management and/or regulatory affairs, CAPA and complaints, and internal  and external audits.

 

2. Must have detailed knowledge of GMP/QSR and ISO international regulations and standards which apply to SLI.

 

3. Must be computer literate in office applications such as MS Word and Excel.

 

4. Must possess excellent communication, interpersonal, and analytical  skills, both written and oral and be able to conduct presentations for  all levels of employees and management.  Interpersonal and analytical  skills should extend into areas of personnel development, coaching, and  counseling.  Interpersonal skills shall allow for building consensus and  influence others outside of areas of direct control.

 

5. Experience and/or certification in quality engineering or quality auditing skills is desired.

descripcion:
The position will create competitive advantage through the development and implementation of strategies that deliver lowest total cost, ensure continuity of material supply, and build and maintain relationships with Packaging/Indirect Area and/or assigned Commodities.  In addition, this position will serve as the process owner on Supplier Quality. 

• Participate in the supplier selection and approval process.

• Responsible for negotiating prices, commercial terms, and implementing purchasing agreements with suppliers.  

• Develop, monitor and manage performance of assigned suppliers to achieve service, cost, quality, and asset goals.

• Work internally with planning and forecasting, as well as, suppliers (where possible) to define and develop appropriate vendor managed inventory levels.

• Work closely with Product Development, Marketing, Engineering, Quality, Planning, and assigned suppliers to support the development and implementation of new and/or renovated products.

• Partner with Supplier, Engineering and Marketing in supporting Material Cost Take out projects. 

• Forecast, manage and develop options to offset inflation. 

• Partner with Procurement team, Plant QA teams and be the process owner for Supplier Quality.

• Will require travel.
requisitos:
• Bachelor's degree required- Engineering, Operations /Supply Chain management. MBA, CPM, and Lean training is a plus. 

• 10+ years prior buying, purchasing, global sourcing or Engineering/Supply Chain experience. 

• Supplier Quality or plant quality management experience (desirable). 

• Well versed in purchasing techniques such as strategic sourcing, supplier selection, developing contracts, supplier management, and supply chain logistics. Latin America  sourcing experience a plus. 

• Strong negotiation and influencing skills and solid business acumen. 

• Experience leading or supporting procurement, commodity, and supply chain improvement initiatives. 

• Results oriented, self-starter, good problem solving skills, and ability to handle multiple initiatives while meeting all deadlines.  

• Demonstrated project management skills in a cross functional environment. 

• Demonstrated ability to build relationships and work effectively with multiple functions, sites, and suppliers.  

• Excellent oral and written communication skills across all levels of the organization. 

• Solid analytical skills, and proficiency with Excel and other Microsoft Office software.

• Fluent in English a must.

descripcion:
Plantronics is a global leader in business and consumer audio communications. For more than 50 years, we've been driven by a single obsession to support our customers' most important needs: experiencing and facilitating simple and clear communications while enjoying distraction-free environments. 



Mission: We discover and invent the tools and technologies that provide a focused and distraction-free environment for you to perform at your best.



Summary:

This position will play a key role in contributing to the development of Plantronics test strategies, test equipment improvement and implementation for Plantronics WW manufacturing support. 



Responsibilities:

•  (60%) include software design, analysis, programming, debugging, trouble-shooting for development of new test hardware platforms. 

• (40%) Designs, develops, modify and evaluate electronics parts, components or integrated circuitry for development of RF and audio electronic test equipment and other test hardware systems. 

• Has a very strong understanding of DECT/Bluetooth/802.11/GSM technologies. 

• Manages own programming and hardware activities including analog and digital hardware and software operating systems. 

• Responsibility for the programming in Labview. 

• Must be considered a Labview expert. Needs to have a good understanding of Test Stand. 

• Needs to have a good understanding of RF designs pertaining to DECT protocols and RF parametrics. 

• Follows standard practices and procedures to analyze situations or data from which answers can be readily obtained. Associate will receive assignments in the form of objectives with goals and will need to determine the process by which to meet those goals. 

• Works on issues where analysis of the situation or data requires review of relevant factors.
requisitos:

• 4-5 years experience in Test Engineering or related experience.

• 3-5 years experience in Software development.

• 2-4 years' experience in RF technology and design.

• Experience with or considered a Labview expert. 

• Test Stand experience is required. C, C++. Delphy, SQL, Microsoft Visual and Microsoft Basic programming experience is desirable.  

• Has experience developing and implementing test programs supporting high volume low test time environments.

• Experience working programming projects with multiple programs or shared development tasks.

• Experience with Object Oriented language concepts and implementation desired.

• Experience with Perforce or other SCC applications.



Language:

• 90% English proficient speaking and listening.

Esta es una vacante que pocas veces publicamos, así que aprovechamos momentos como éste para contratar a personas como tú!

 

El Analista de Desarrollo Organizacional Sr. realiza actividades diferentes todo el tiempo. Una de las principales es diseñar e implementar procesos de desarrollo organizacional que permitan potencializar el talento de GTI. Definir el proceso de diseño de planes de desarrollo para el personal. Administrar y mantener actualizadas las descripciones de puesto. Documentar los nuevos procesos del área y actualizar los existentes. Analizar y proponer estrategias que contribuyan a los procesos de capital humano para la retención del talento. Administrar el modelo de competencias de acuerdo a los objetivos organizacionales. Analizar y alinear las necesidades de capacitación de los colaboradores. Asegurar el proceso de evaluación integral de desempeño. Gestionar la comunicación de acuerdo a los objetivos del área de gestión de talento. Contribuir a la mejora del clima organizacional.

descripcion:
The position will create competitive advantage through the development and implementation of strategies that deliver lowest total cost, ensure continuity of material supply, and build and maintain relationships with Packaging/Indirect Area and/or assigned Commodities.  In addition, this position will serve as the process owner on Supplier Quality. 

• Participate in the supplier selection and approval process.

• Responsible for negotiating prices, commercial terms, and implementing purchasing agreements with suppliers.  

• Develop, monitor and manage performance of assigned suppliers to achieve service, cost, quality, and asset goals.

• Work internally with planning and forecasting, as well as, suppliers (where possible) to define and develop appropriate vendor managed inventory levels.

• Work closely with Product Development, Marketing, Engineering, Quality, Planning, and assigned suppliers to support the development and implementation of new and/or renovated products.

• Partner with Supplier, Engineering and Marketing in supporting Material Cost Take out projects. 

• Forecast, manage and develop options to offset inflation. 

• Partner with Procurement team, Plant QA teams and be the process owner for Supplier Quality.

• Will require travel.
requisitos:
• Bachelor's degree required- Engineering, Operations /Supply Chain management. MBA, CPM, and Lean training is a plus. 

• 10+ years prior buying, purchasing, global sourcing or Engineering/Supply Chain experience. 

• Supplier Quality or plant quality management experience (desirable). 

• Well versed in purchasing techniques such as strategic sourcing, supplier selection, developing contracts, supplier management, and supply chain logistics. Latin America  sourcing experience a plus. 

• Strong negotiation and influencing skills and solid business acumen. 

• Experience leading or supporting procurement, commodity, and supply chain improvement initiatives. 

• Results oriented, self-starter, good problem solving skills, and ability to handle multiple initiatives while meeting all deadlines.  

• Demonstrated project management skills in a cross functional environment. 

• Demonstrated ability to build relationships and work effectively with multiple functions, sites, and suppliers.  

• Excellent oral and written communication skills across all levels of the organization. 

• Solid analytical skills, and proficiency with Excel and other Microsoft Office software.

• Fluent in English a must.

descripcion:
1. Desarrollo y monitoreo de proveedores.

2. Elabora y presenta reportes sobre pruebas o inspecciones realizadas de la materia prima que se utiliza en el área de producción teniendo comunicación con los proveedores.

3. Aplicar acciones correctivas del Proveedor usando el formato 8D y su seguimiento.

4. Notifica al coordinador de calidad sobre las desviaciones a los estándares de calidad y las causas que las originan. 

5. Mantiene la disciplina con el personal a su cargo, atendiendo y cumpliendo con el reglamento interior de trabajo. 

6. Supervisa la inspección a productos provenientes de proveedor, para asegurarse de que estos cumplan y cuenten con los requerimientos y estándares de calidad, requiriendo acciones correctivas en caso de ser necesario.

7. Elabora reportes para el estudio de análisis de fallas dirigidos al coordinador de calidad. 

8. Realiza pruebas, recauda datos de fallas,  proporciona muestras de materiales o productos además de supervisar el equipo técnico de reparacion.

9. Registra los datos estadísticos para ayudar a determinar y mantener la calidad y confiabilidad de los productos (Score card). 

10. Efectúa pruebas o inspecciones de materia prima y/o productos en varias etapas dentro del proceso de producción además de administrar el área de MRB realizando juntas semanales con los departamentos involucrados, definir propuestas de actividades para la reducción del inventario. Cumplir con las metas de inventario de MRB (Metas variables de acuerdo a proyectos).

11. Asiste a juntas semanales con el coordinar de Calidad, para revisar los resultados. 

12. Junto con el Coordinador de Calidad encargado de programar vacaciones, así como también promover y evaluar el entrenamiento y desempeño del personal a su cargo, para los incrementos salariales.

descripcion:
•	Gestionar el producto dentro de la empresa durante todo su ciclo de vida.

•	Participar en la definición y toma de decisiones de la estrategia comercial del producto. 

•	Conocer a detalle el valor del producto, diseño definido, plan de mercadotecnia, plan del producto, estrategia de liberación y todo lo requerido para la puesta en el mercado y el soporte interno en la empresa en la etapa de lanzamiento del producto.
